properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 65 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN 34-01N 014-18E AT
300001Z MAY. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C:  42474 4220,
PHONE: 39 06 5908 4527, 39 06 5908 4409,
39 06 5908 4796, FAX: 39 06 5908 4793,
39 06 5922737, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
